ertugrul2019activism.title: Activism via attention: interpretable spatiotemporal learning to forecast protest activities
ertugrul2019activism.author: Ertugrul, Ali Mert and Lin, Yu-Ru and Chung, Wen-Ting and Yan, Muheng and Li, Ang
ertugrul2019activism.paperMotivationText: When analysing protest movements, it is crucial to consider the dynamic interactions among the multitude of social, temporal and spatial dimensions
ertugrul2019activism.paperContributionText: Interpretable, predictive model to forecast offline protest events from online activities
ertugrul2019activism.paperResultsText: DL model with spatiotemporal attention outperforms other models for predicting protest events
ertugrul2019activism.resourcesOtherText: Tweets on protest movements (BLM: Charllottesville, Ferguson)
